commit message:
Updated logo to adhere to the material design specs better.

https://www.google.com/design/spec/style/icons.html

Merge pull request #22 from pserwylo/update-logo

Updated logo to adhere to the material design specs better.

Enable resource shrinking.

Doesn't do much to apk size at the moment, but it also doesn't add much
to the build time at the moment. If the build time becomes a problem,
then perhaps this can be disabled.

Merge pull request #23 from pserwylo/enable-proguard

Enable proguard to reduce apk size

Merge pull request #26 from pserwylo/update-f-droid-image-to-new

Updated 'Get it on...' logos to new artwork.
